categories.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: Cut to shot of the actual Aang who momentarily closes his eyes and cringes in disbelief before leaning forward over the railing even more, eyes bugging out. Cuts back to the actors on stage.
paragraphs.text: Cut to shot of the actual Aang who momentarily closes his eyes and cringes in disbelief before leaning forward over the railing even more, eyes bugging out. Cuts back to the actors on stage.

paragraphs.body: Cut to shot of Actor Iroh, a very rotund, round-faced man sporting a slightly exaggerated imitation of the real Iroh's hairstyle, complete with a top-knot, beard, and sideburns.
paragraphs.text: Cut to shot of Actor Iroh, a very rotund, round-faced man sporting a slightly exaggerated imitation of the real Iroh's hairstyle, complete with a top-knot, beard, and sideburns.

paragraphs.body: Fade to a background drawing of the Southern Air Temple. The camera pans down to show Actress Aang searching, and finds a tail behind a bush prop.
paragraphs.text: Fade to a background drawing of the Southern Air Temple. The camera pans down to show Actress Aang searching, and finds a tail behind a bush prop.

paragraphs.body: Cut to Actor Bumi with an Omashu background.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Actor Bumi with an Omashu background.

paragraphs.body: Fade to a stagehand using a crank to lower the actors. Actress Katara and Actor Jet appear on a small rope platform. Actress Katara cries.
paragraphs.text: Fade to a stagehand using a crank to lower the actors. Actress Katara and Actor Jet appear on a small rope platform. Actress Katara cries.

paragraphs.body: Fade to the team traveling on a large Appa prop with mountains painted in the background.
paragraphs.text: Fade to the team traveling on a large Appa prop with mountains painted in the background.

paragraphs.body: Cut to Actor Jet jumping in front of the camera. He wears googly eyes and waves his hook hands around. Camera zooms out to show the Team Avatar players surrounding Actor Jet.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Actor Jet jumping in front of the camera. He wears googly eyes and waves his hook hands around. Camera zooms out to show the Team Avatar players surrounding Actor Jet.

paragraphs.body: Fade to outside the theater, where everyone except Aang is present for the second intermission.
paragraphs.text: Fade to outside the theater, where everyone except Aang is present for the second intermission.

paragraphs.body: Fade to outside the theater, as Team Avatar is walking away.
paragraphs.text: Fade to outside the theater, as Team Avatar is walking away.
